languages.text: {n}При слове "порядки" бригадир чуть вздрагивает.{/n} "Каждый день проводим в трудах праведных да с молитвою на устах, как и полагается верным слугам Лорд-капитана. На урезанную пайковую норму не ропщем, об родных, которых на работы угнали в другие отсеки, не плачем. Блюстителей строгих чтим, хоть они и... лютуют. Мы покорны и желаем принести пользу".

{n}The mention of rules makes the Foreman wince a little.{/n} "We spend every day doing honest work with a prayer on our lips, as the Lord Captain's faithful servants ought to. We don't grumble about the slashed rations. We don't weep for our loved ones who were taken away to work in other bays. We respect our stern enforcers, as... ferocious as they've been. We are obedient and seek to be useful."

languages.text: {n}Bei der Erwähnung von Regeln zuckt der Vorarbeiter kurz zusammen.{/n} "Wir verrichten jeden Tag ehrliche Arbeit mit einem Gebet auf unseren Lippen, wie es alle treuen Diener des Lord Captains tun sollten. Wir murren angesichts der gekürzten Rationen nicht. Wir weinen nicht um unsere Liebsten, die in andere Module gebracht wurden. Wir respektieren unsere gestrengen Enforcer, egal ... wie brutal sie auch waren. Wir sind gehorsam und wollen uns nützlich machen."
languages.original_text: {n}The mention of rules makes the Foreman wince a little.{/n} "We spend every day doing honest work with a prayer on our lips, as the Lord Captain's faithful servants ought to. We don't grumble about the slashed rations. We don't weep for our loved ones who were taken away to work in other bays. We respect our stern enforcers, as... ferocious as they've been. We are obedient and seek to be useful."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bei der Erwähnung von Regeln zuckt der Vorarbeiter kurz zusammen.{/n} "Wir verrichten jeden Tag ehrliche Arbeit mit einem Gebet auf unseren Lippen, wie es alle treuen Diener des Lord Captains tun sollten. Wir murren angesichts der gekürzten Rationen nicht. Wir weinen nicht um unsere Liebsten, die in andere Module gebracht wurden. Wir respektieren unsere gestrengen Enforcer, egal ... wie brutal sie auch waren. Wir sind gehorsam und wollen uns nützlich machen."

languages.text: {n}La mention des règles fait grimacer le contremaître.{/n} « Nous passons nos journées à travailler honnêtement avec une prière aux lèvres, comme il se doit des serviteurs {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. Nous ne nous plaignons pas de la réduction des rations. Nous ne pleurons pas les proches qui nous ont été enlevés pour travailler dans d'autres baies. Nous respectons nos prévôts... aussi féroces puissent-ils être. Nos sommes obéissants et faisons tout pour nous rendre utiles. »
languages.original_text: {n}The mention of rules makes the Foreman wince a little.{/n} "We spend every day doing honest work with a prayer on our lips, as the Lord Captain's faithful servants ought to. We don't grumble about the slashed rations. We don't weep for our loved ones who were taken away to work in other bays. We respect our stern enforcers, as... ferocious as they've been. We are obedient and seek to be useful."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mention des règles fait grimacer le contremaître.{/n} « Nous passons nos journées à travailler honnêtement avec une prière aux lèvres, comme il se doit des serviteurs {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. Nous ne nous plaignons pas de la réduction des rations. Nous ne pleurons pas les proches qui nous ont été enlevés pour travailler dans d'autres baies. Nous respectons nos prévôts... aussi féroces puissent-ils être. Nos sommes obéissants et faisons tout pour nous rendre utiles. »

languages.text: {n}El capataz da un ligero respingo al mencionarle las nuevas normas.{/n} «Nos pasamos todo el día trabajando honradamente con una plegaria en los labios, como es obligación de todo siervo fiel {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán. No refunfuñamos por el racionamiento de la comida. No lloramos a los seres queridos que se llevaron para trabajar en otros compartimentos. Respetamos a los guardias por severos que sean, a pesar de su... ferocidad. Obedecemos y queremos ser útiles».
languages.original_text: {n}The mention of rules makes the Foreman wince a little.{/n} "We spend every day doing honest work with a prayer on our lips, as the Lord Captain's faithful servants ought to. We don't grumble about the slashed rations. We don't weep for our loved ones who were taken away to work in other bays. We respect our stern enforcers, as... ferocious as they've been. We are obedient and seek to be useful."

traits.locale_text: {n}El capataz da un ligero respingo al mencionarle las nuevas normas.{/n} «Nos pasamos todo el día trabajando honradamente con una plegaria en los labios, como es obligación de todo siervo fiel {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán. No refunfuñamos por el racionamiento de la comida. No lloramos a los seres queridos que se llevaron para trabajar en otros compartimentos. Respetamos a los guardias por severos que sean, a pesar de su... ferocidad. Obedecemos y queremos ser útiles».

languages.text: {n}規則の話をすると、作業長は少しばかりうろたえた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテンの忠実なる従者たちがそうあるように、ワシらは毎日、祈りを口ずさみつつまっとうに仕事をしています。配給が減らされたところで不平は言いません。他のベイで働くために連れ去られた愛する者を思って泣くこともありません。ワシらは厳格なエンフォーサーを尊敬しています…かつては獰猛でしたが。ワシらは従順で、お役に立ちたいと思っております」
languages.original_text: {n}The mention of rules makes the Foreman wince a little.{/n} "We spend every day doing honest work with a prayer on our lips, as the Lord Captain's faithful servants ought to. We don't grumble about the slashed rations. We don't weep for our loved ones who were taken away to work in other bays. We respect our stern enforcers, as... ferocious as they've been. We are obedient and seek to be useful."

traits.locale_text: {n}規則の話をすると、作業長は少しばかりうろたえた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテンの忠実なる従者たちがそうあるように、ワシらは毎日、祈りを口ずさみつつまっとうに仕事をしています。配給が減らされたところで不平は言いません。他のベイで働くために連れ去られた愛する者を思って泣くこともありません。ワシらは厳格なエンフォーサーを尊敬しています…かつては獰猛でしたが。ワシらは従順で、お役に立ちたいと思っております」

languages.text: {n}听到“规矩”这个词，工头似乎有些畏缩。{/n}“我们每天都勤勤恳恳地做着工作，认认真真地祈祷，就像每位忠诚的仆人应当做的那样。就算我们的口粮变少了，我们也不会抱怨。就算我们的挚爱之人被带到了其他甲板工作，我们也不会为他们流泪。我们尊重那些严厉的执法者，因为……他们一直都非常凶狠。我们愿意做恭顺的良民，我们想当有用的人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The mention of rules makes the Foreman wince a little.{/n} "We spend every day doing honest work with a prayer on our lips, as the Lord Captain's faithful servants ought to. We don't grumble about the slashed rations. We don't weep for our loved ones who were taken away to work in other bays. We respect our stern enforcers, as... ferocious as they've been. We are obedient and seek to be useful."

traits.locale_text: {n}听到“规矩”这个词，工头似乎有些畏缩。{/n}“我们每天都勤勤恳恳地做着工作，认认真真地祈祷，就像每位忠诚的仆人应当做的那样。就算我们的口粮变少了，我们也不会抱怨。就算我们的挚爱之人被带到了其他甲板工作，我们也不会为他们流泪。我们尊重那些严厉的执法者，因为……他们一直都非常凶狠。我们愿意做恭顺的良民，我们想当有用的人。”

languages.text: {n}Kuralların bahsinin geçmesi, Ustabaşı'nın bir miktar irkilmesine neden oluyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan'ın sadık hizmetkârların yapması gerektiği gibi her günümüzü ağzımızdan dualarımız eksik olmadan, namusumuzla çalışarak geçiriyoruz. Diğer bölmelerde çalışmak için aramızdan ayrılan sevdiklerimiz için gözyaşı dökmüyoruz. Haşin infazcılarımıza hürmet gösteriyoruz. Her ne kadar... Acımasız olsalar da. İtaatkârız ve işe yaramak istiyoruz."
languages.original_text: {n}The mention of rules makes the Foreman wince a little.{/n} "We spend every day doing honest work with a prayer on our lips, as the Lord Captain's faithful servants ought to. We don't grumble about the slashed rations. We don't weep for our loved ones who were taken away to work in other bays. We respect our stern enforcers, as... ferocious as they've been. We are obedient and seek to be useful."
